title: Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan pretty and appreciate its perfect color and true-to-size fit. They describe it as soft, comfortable, and of great quality, with one customer noting it's perfect to wear over a cocktail dress.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful bolero
items.body: Soft, light to medium velvet. I bought a M in Royal Blue, I'm 5'4 120 lbs. Beautiful color, true to pics, fits great. Bought to match the Woosea sleeveless Split Mermaid Cocktail Dress I bought in M, great fit. Great color match. The shrug is slightly a darker Royal Blue but the same tone. The small ruffle on this shrug compliments the dress ruffle. If you like the dress, check out ShoeLand Melinda low heels in Royal Blue. True to my size, beautiful match & comfortable. All from Amazon, all delivered quickly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: This is a super cute little shrug I got it to go over a dress for my holiday party it's super soft I like the shift in color and the sleeves were long enough which I'm really excited about and it gives good coverage in the front I would definitely order this again Read more
items.author: Nichole Reigard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty!
items.body: This was the perfect addition to my outfit for a wedding. It was true to size and held up well to washing. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Navy Blue Velvet Shrug
items.body: This is a nice navy blue velvet shrug. It fit really nice. The quality of the material was good. Ordered a medium and it fit perfect. (Ref. 136 lbs) Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Gorgeous, tons of co
items.body: So So So many compliments. I’ve lost some weight so my arms aren’t my greatest asset. I found a really cute sleeveless dress and this was perfect for it. Dark Blue. Read more
items.author: Melissa Moore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I was Looking For!
items.body: This is exactly what I needed! These little shrugs are so comfortable! I’m always cold and don’t love my arms, but didn’t want to wear a big, bulky sweater to a cocktail event. I wasn’t sure which combo I’d like, so I bought both colors and am keeping them both! Fit is true to size. I’m 5’6”, around 155 and bought a medium. The colors are vibrant, and it’s just the right density to take the chill off inside without making you sweat (until you start dancing and throw it off, that is!!) Read more
items.author: Melissa McBurney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Velvet velour jacket with ruffle
items.body: Perfect color and fabric. Had a short sleeve velvet dress and wanted some sleeves. This item fit the bill. The jacket is a nice quality velour and beautiful dark navy blue. Can hardly believe I found this jacket that matched the fabric and the color of the dress perfectly Read more
items.author: Jane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality and price
items.body: I bought this for my neices wedding. I have this gorgeous dress, however it's spaghetti straps. Hate my arms and it's a winter wedding, so this caught my eye. I tried it with my dress just doesn't quite fit the style. But I tell ya the fit is great. I always have trouble with long sleeve and a big chest so I normally have to size up. I am 5.1 130lbs 38D and I got a small. Love the fit. Quality is super nice for the price. Read more
items.author: Lisa Karnes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Purple, Burgundy, Pink Purple, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
